availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Maysville, Kentucky, tailor. Virginia native. Married to Beulah Wise. Father of Susan A. Wise, Ann C. Wise, Harriet A. Wise, Hecuba Wise, Henry A. Wise, Catherine Wise, William Wise, and John P. Wise. Tailor in Maysville in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 115B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 14.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 4, p. 14.
Find A Grave, "William H Wise (1817-1884)," Memorial #39834283, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/39834283 (accessed December 16, 2018).
